page.title: 19A typical day
page.content: Normally my brother comes into my bedroom at six o'clock. I get up about eight to get my Mum,Dad and Stu (my brother) and of course me.On a week day I would have cereal but on Saturday and Sunday I have just toast.For the next four hours I watch T.V. I get dressed about eleven o'clock.Then Mum calls me for lunch.Hamburgers I hope.I hope it isn't salad 'UGH'.After lunch I play out in the garden.Then we sometimes go to my Grandma's.I hope she's still got her sweet supply.When I come home we have tea and watch T.V. My favourite is Kenny Everett.Opps I forgot to say if we don't go to Grandma's house I go to Mark Andrew's house to watch the video.Now to the present.I still go to bed early.
